mapper.select: select id, order_code orderCode, user_id userId, scenic_id scenicId, type, goods_Id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, goods_price goodsPrice, state, expired_time expiredTime, amount, pay_type payType, enter_time enterTime, ticket_order_code ticketOrderCode, id_number idNumber, name, prepay_id prepayId, bat_code batCode, bat_code_other batCodeOther, checked_num checkedNum, return_num returnNum, uncheked_num unchekedNum, sigle_price siglePrice, is_distribute_order isDistributeOrder, order_source orderSource, pay_status payStatus, actual_pay actualPay, should_pay shouldPay, user_wechat_name userWechatName, phone, max_number_of_users maxNumberOfUsers, create_time createTime, create_user_id createUserId, create_user_name createUserName, update_time updateTime, update_user_id updateUserId, distributor_id distributorId, update_user_name updateUserName, profit_status profit_status, order_type orderType, offline_user offlineUser, offline_status offlineStatus, snapshot, project_id projectId, qr_code qrCode, proof, reason, comm_sts commSts, delete_status deleteStatus, group_order_id groupOrderId, pay_time payTime, promotion_id promotionId, user_of_coupon_id userOfCouponId, coupon_price couponPrice, ship_ticket_code shipTicketCode, transaction_id transactionId from orders where id = #{id}
